original_title: After The Music by François Couperin: Les Baricades Mystérieuses
overview: My first "real movie", which I started when I was a student, in 1978/79. An exploration / transformation of a mysterious house, black and white, with music by Couperin as indicated by the title. - Nick Collins
title: After The Music by François Couperin: Les Baricades Mystérieuses
